body:
Sigh...


Not unless I get funding...


On 2010-04-28 03:56:14 -0700, Jan Wienold said:


> Hi Lars,
> 
> the workshop this year will be in Freiburg (at the Fraunhofer ISE), Germany.
> 
> Cheers,
> 
> Jan
> 
> Lars O. Grobe wrote:
>> Hi!
>>> Anyone have any objections to a Sept. 20-22 schedule for the 2010
>>> workshop?
>> No, not to the schedule, but out of curiousity - is there also any
>> pre-announcement on the location?
>> 
>> I would love to finally make it to a Radiance Workshops after
>> systematically (not intentionally) missing them so far, and now I am
>> waiting for the good news on the location...
>> 
>> Cheers, Lars.
>> 
>> _______________________________________________
>> Radiance-general mailing list
>> Radiance-general at radiance-online.org
>> http://www.radiance-online.org/mailman/listinfo/radiance-general
>
